testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: When the value of backface visibility property is 'hidden' then the back side of a transformed element is invisible when facing the viewer

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Check if rotateX 90 degrees with perspective make it invisible

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This transform rotates a tall rectangle by 90 degrees then applies a 3D rotation in the X axis

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Check that rotate the 2:1 rectangle on X-axis for 60 degree we will get a square and completely cover the red square and here we use border due to the rectangle not be rotated would cover the red square

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Check that rotate3d a 2:1 rectangle on X-axis for 60 degree we will get a square and completely cover the red square and here we use border due to the rectangle not be rotated would cover the red square

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Check that rotate a 2:1 rectangle on X-axis for -60 degree we will get a square and completely cover the red square and here we use border due to the rectangle not be rotated would cover the red square

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Check that rotate a 2:1 rectangle on X-axis for 60 degree we will get a square and completely cover the red square and here we use border due to the rectangle not be rotated would cover the red square

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Test css transform property existence

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Test css transform style evaluation and validation

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: The 'perspective-origin' property set 'center' computes to 50% for the vertical position.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: The 'perspective-origin' property set 'center' computes to 50% for the horizontal position.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: The 'perspective-origin' property set 'bottom' computes to 100% for the vertical position.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: The 'perspective-origin' property set 'top' computes to 0% for the vertical position.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: The 'perspective-origin' property set 'left' computes to 0% for the horizontal position.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: The 'perspective-origin' property set 'right' computes to 100% for the horizontal position.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Asserts that origin 'x1' visually moves the objects '-x1*d/(d-1)'

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Asserts that origin '(x y)' visually moves the objects '(-x -y)*d/(d-1)'

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Asserts that points on the z=0 plane are unchanged

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Asserts that the scaling is proportional to d/(d - Z) for a negative Z

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Asserts that the scaling is proportional to d/(d - Z) for a positive Z

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Rotate 45 degree in x axis

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Rotate 45 degree in y axis

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: When the value of transform is 'rotateY(90deg)' the foward side of a transformed element disappears.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: When 'backface-visiblity' is set to visible the back side of a transformed element is visible.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This tests that two 90-degree rotations with the default 'transform-style: flat' do not add together to form a 180-degree rotation

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: A rotateY transform 1 with perspective should result in a trapezoid

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: A rotateY transform 2 with perspective should result in a trapezoid

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This tests that scale3d(2 2 0) being singular causes the contents not to display

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Check that transform property with rotate function and one parameter

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: The transformed div should establishe a 3D rendering context

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: The transformed div should rotateX by 180 degrees

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: The transformed div should rotate 90 degrees

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Check if the element backface-visibility is 'visible'

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Check if the element perspective is '200px'

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Check if the element perspective-origin is '50px 27px'

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Check if the element transform is 'matrix(2, 0, 0, 2, 0, 0)'

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Check if the element transform-origin is 'left top'

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: Check if the element transform-style is 'preserve-3d'

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This tests that a very simple case of backface-visibility causes the element to disappear: rotateX(180deg) is specified on the same element that has backface-visibility: hidden.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This is identical to transform3d-backface-visibility-001-manual.html

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This tests that if a parent and child are in the same 3D rendering context and a 60deg rotation on the parent combines with a 60deg rotation on the child to make a 120deg rotation

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This is the same as transform3d-backface-visibility-001-manual.html except it uses scalez(-1) instead of rotatex(180deg).

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This is part 2 of a series that tests that various matrix3d()s are equivalent to other transform functions.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This is part 3 of a series that tests that various matrix3d()s are equivalent to other transform functions.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This is part 4 of a series that tests that various matrix3d()s are equivalent to other transform functions.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This tests that the perspective() transform works the same as an equivalent 'perspective' property

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This tests that 'perspective' and 'perspective-origin' have the same effect as an appropriately calculated sequence of translate() and perspective()

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This tests that 'perspective-origin: 0 0' is the same as 'perspective-origin: top left' different from no 'perspective-origin' and different from no perspective or no transform

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This tests that if preserve-3d is specified so four 45deg rotations equal one 180deg rotation

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This is the first in a series of four tests that test that translations work correctly when combined with margins or translations on various elements

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This is the second in a series of four tests that test that translations work correctly when combined with margins or translations on various elements when preserve-3d is enabled

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This is the third in a series of four tests that test that translations work correctly when combined with margins or translations on various elements when preserve-3d is enabled

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This is the fourth in a series of four tests that test that translations work correctly when combined with margins or translations on various elements when preserve-3d is enabled

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This tests that rotate3d(1 0 0 45deg) is the same as rotatex(45deg)

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This tests that rotate3d(0 1 0 45deg) is the same as rotatey(45deg)

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This tests that rotatex(45deg) rotatey(360deg) rotatex(360deg) is the same as rotatex(45deg)

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This tests that rotateX(45deg) has the same effect (with perspective) with a top left origin and a top right origin

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This tests that rotateY(45deg) rotateY(360deg) has the same effect as just rotateY(45deg)

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This tests that translate3d() before and after rotatex() is the same as an equivalent 'transform-origin'

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: This tests that translatez(+-10px) before and after rotatex() is the same as an equivalent 'transform-origin' and different from translatez(+-20px)

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
testcase.purpose: 3D transforms can not be applied to anonymous block boxes
